remarks: Associative law for endomorphism scalar product operation.  (Contributed by NM, 10-Oct-2013.)
statement:
tendosp.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
tendosp.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
tendosp.e $e |- E = ( ( TEndo ` K ) ` W ) $.
tendospass $p |- ( ( ( K e. X /\ W e. H ) /\ ( U e. E /\ V e. E /\ F e. T ) ) -> ( ( U o. V ) ` F ) = ( U ` ( V ` F ) ) ) $.
